description: React component 'Upload' enabling users to upload images via file selection or camera capture, managing preview, camera stream, and upload process, then navigating to a result page.

methods.name: Upload()
methods.description: React functional component supporting image upload and camera capture, with navigation to results.

methods.name: onPick
methods.description: Handles file selection, creates preview URL.

methods.name: startCamera
methods.description: Requests access to user's camera and starts streaming.

methods.name: capture
methods.description: Captures current video frame into a Blob, converts to File, updates preview.

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Uploads the selected or captured image via API, then navigates to results page.
